quote: He gave his life to save the thing that mattered most to him: his Clanmates,” he meowed softly. “He truly has the stars at his paws now. You will see him again, when it is time.
quote_letters: HE GAVE HIS LIFE TO SAVE THE THING THAT MATTERED MOST TO HIM HIS CLANMATES HE MEOWED SOFTLY HE TRULY HAS THE STARS AT HIS PAWS NOW YOU WILL SEE HIM AGAIN WHEN IT IS TIME
